snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 2,012 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
abstract: Department of Defense confirms the death of one American service member as part the Afghan war and related operations.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 2,012 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations.
